title: General
stimulusHtml:
4 points maximum

Conclusion for cross I (1 point maximum)

  • Bronze dominant/red recessive

  • Autosomal (non-sex-linked)

Possible explanations for cross I (1 point maximum)

  • All F 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BD@ /heterozygotes express dominant trait (bronze).

  • F 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BE@ shows 3:1 ratio (bronze:red/dominant:recessive).

  • Equal distribution of F 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BE@ phenotypes for both genders.

Conclusion for Cross II (1 point maximum)

  • Stunted dominant/normal recessive

  • Autosomal (non-sex-linked)


Possible explanations for cross II (1 point maximum)

  • All F 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BD@ /heterozygotes express dominant trait (stunted)

  • F 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BE@ shows 3:1 ratio (stunted:normal/dominant:recessive).

  • Equal distribution of F 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37BE@ phenotypes for both genders.
